summary: This is a daily assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated Saturday, July 27, 2019. It lists staff assignments for various posts, shifts, and units, including the Special Housing Unit (SHU). The document is significant as it provides a record of prison staffing on the day Jeffrey Epstein was found dead in his cell.

persons.name: Melendez
persons.context: Listed under "STAFF SEARCH" on the roster, indicating a staff member assigned to search duties at the MCC New York on July 27, 2019.

events.title: MCC New York Daily Staff Assignments
events.description: The Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York operated with staff assigned to various posts including the Special Housing Unit (SHU), control rooms, visitation, and sanitation.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, New York, NY
keyFacts: This is a staff assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York for Saturday, July 27, 2019.
The roster details shift times (e.g., 00:00-08:00, 06:00-14:00) and specific posts including the Special Housing Unit (SHU), control rooms, visitation, and phone monitoring.
The document lists a staff member named Melendez assigned to search duties.
The date of the roster, July 27, 2019, is the day Jeffrey Epstein was found deceased in his cell at the MCC.
